HeroSection.title: Rawad Al-Tawjih
HeroSection.subtitle: 18+ years of experience in human resources and administrative affairs

AboutSection.title: About Us
AboutSection.subtitle: Rawad Al-Tawjih for Human Resources, Administrative and Government Relations Services
AboutSection.ourMissionDesc: To provide innovative and reliable solutions that enhance efficiency and operational effectiveness for our clients through a 100% qualified Saudi workforce.
AboutSection.ourVisionDesc: To become a leading company in the field of human resources services, administrative affairs and government relations.

achievements.experienceDesc: Our practical experience exceeds 18 years with the largest Saudi companies and businessmen
achievements.saudiWorkforceDesc: Our team is 100% Saudi with sufficient expertise to provide the best services
achievements.complianceDesc: We aim to reach more than 100 clients in 2025
achievements.trackRecordDesc: We provide our services by managing your work to manage employee affairs

AboutSection.whyChooseUsDesc: We provide our services by managing your work to manage employee affairs and daily business operations, with a 100% qualified Saudi workforce.

OurValuesSection.title: Our Values
OurValuesSection.description: The core values that guide our professional services

values.excellenceDesc: We excel with sufficient expertise to provide the best services for your business and make it easier for you
values.clientCentricDesc: We help you manage employee affairs and daily business operations
values.innovationDesc: We continuously work on developing capabilities, knowledge and training our team
values.trustDesc: Our team has high efficiency in the field of human resources and administrative affairs

hr.title: Human Resources Services
hr.description: Complete HR solutions including recruitment, payroll management, and employee relations

admin.title: Administrative Services
admin.description: Comprehensive administrative support to streamline your business operations

government.title: Government Relations
government.description: Expert handling of all government transactions and regulatory compliance

consulting.title: Business Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic consulting to enhance your business performance and growth

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss your business needs and discover how our professional services can help you achieve your goals.

ContactSection.title: Get In
ContactSection.description: Ready to take your business to the next level? Contact us today for a consultation and discover how our professional services can help you achieve your goals.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: We're here to help you with all your business needs. Reach out to us through any of the following channels.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your business needs...

whatsapp.title: Prefer WhatsApp?
whatsapp.description: Click here to chat with us directly on WhatsApp

ClientsSection.title: Our Clients
ClientsSection.description: We are proud to serve a diverse range of clients from various sectors, reflecting their trust in our professional services

achievements.yearsExperienceDesc: Over two decades of professional expertise

TestimonialsSection.title: Client Testimonials
TestimonialsSection.description: Discover what our clients say about our professional services and expertise in human resources and management

ProcessSection.title: How We Work With You
ProcessSection.description: We follow an organized and professional methodology to ensure delivering the best services and achieving your business goals

LocaleLayout.name: Rawad Al-Tawjih | Human Resources, Administrative and Government Relations Services
LocaleLayout.description: We at Rawad Al-Tawjih Company are proud to provide professional expertise exceeding eighteen years in the field of specialized human resources services, administrative affairs management, and efficient government transactions processing. We strive to facilitate your business operations through innovative solutions and a 100% qualified Saudi workforce, ensuring you the highest levels of efficiency and operational excellence.
